Articles.Content:
I have installed mods, and I know where to put them, but It either doesn't do anything or it destroys the world when I launch things. I have a Mac and I bought KSP on steam and have watched so many videos of people using mods. The mod I wan't to work most is probably BDArmory Continued. When I try to launch anything the world glitches and I see a brown thing and the camera slowly goes deep into space. I really need help and I've tried for days.

Sorry, I  can't use screenshots (I can't use drag and drop, please help). Sorry for any inconveniences!       
Edited September 28, 2016 by ahreaves
screenshots

Hello from the BDAc Development Team 

I would like to help you with this issue you're having with BDAc 

Perhaps you could start by checking which version of KSP you are running and if you have the proper mod version

In addition to this, it sounds like you may have downloaded the source code and dropped it into your gamedata ... I could be wrong but what you describe is generally what happens when you download the source code and drop it into your gamedata folder

Check the BDAc folder name in your gamedata folder and if it has "source" in its name then you downloaded the wrong file

If this is the case then all is not lost as inside of the BDAc source folder is a folder named 'release' which will contain the BDAc folder (BDArmory) ... move this folder to your gamedata folder and then delete the BDAc source folder and voila, BDAc should work

 

Edited September 28, 2016 by DoctorDavinci

19 minutes ago, DoctorDavinci said:

Hello from the BDAc Development Team 

I would like to help you with this issue you're having with BDAc 

Perhaps you could start by checking which version of KSP you are running and if you have the proper mod version

In addition to this, it sounds like you may have downloaded the source code and dropped it into your gamedata ... I could be wrong but what you describe is generally what happens when you download the source code and drop it into your gamedata folder

Check the BDAc folder name in your gamedata folder and if it has "source" in its name then you downloaded the wrong file

 

Im downloading it, and after I checked, and it didn't have "source". So what do I do after that?
I need to know your KSP version ... Also please read this and then you will know how to help me help you
